Name: Rift Rangers
About the game: Ranger, the Master Brain is besieging our dimension! We are expecting endless hordes of monsters and we are sending you in to prevent the assault. For this mission, we are equipping you with turrets to set up a defensive perimeter. Collect the dimensional energy from your slain opponents to upgrade and gain new equipment on site. Only with the right combinations of turrets and upgrades can we stem the tide of invaders! Be warned Ranger, the enemy will not take this lying down! They will send their commanders after you, each with their own unique abilities. Make sure you destroy these commanders in order to disorganize the horde! The fate of world is in your hands, Ranger, and we refuse to die! Features Multiple different towers to utilize and upgrade Casual 20 minute sessions for the busy gamer A rogue-lite experience behind every run A variety of enemies with different strengths and weaknesses Upgrade system to permanently strengthen your runs 13 Difficulty levels to unlock and play
